data.text: @NickTimiraos @friendlycitybks @littlebrown Congrats, Nick. Can't wait to read it.
@NickTimiraos @friendlycitybks @littlebrown Thanks Nick!  Looking forward to this.  Let us know any NYC signings coming up.  Tnx!
@sean_a_dobson @NickTimiraos @littlebrown Hi! You can order an autographed copy of Trillion Dollar Triage at https://t.co/3s8iyIcEnb
@NickTimiraos @friendlycitybks @littlebrown How do I get an autographed copy ?
@NickTimiraos @friendlycitybks @littlebrown It can be a 1 pager... "They didn't."
@NickTimiraos @friendlycitybks @littlebrown "Prevented economic disaster"? Wut? Unemployment rose to 16%.
